game.name: The Isle
game.genres: 액션, 어드벤처, 인디, 대규모 멀티플레이어, 시뮬레이션, 앞서 해보기
game.categories: 멀티플레이어, MMO, PvP, 온라인 PvP, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, Valve Anti-Cheat 사용
game.shortDescription: Experience fierce open world survival gameplay as you attempt to stay alive on an unforgiving island inhabited by dinosaurs! Hunt. Grow. Survive.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Experience fierce open world survival gameplay as you attempt to stay alive on an unforgiving island inhabited by dinosaurs! Hunt. Grow. Survive.
